text1: This diagram shows the messages Facebook stored from you. Grouped by conversations and ranked by the number of messages exchanged.
text2: This diagram is called a bar chart. The length of each bar is proportional to the values that it represents.
text3: For now, we are counting all messages that were recorded by Facebook. In a future update, we will try to also distinguish further e.g. between messages sent and received or between messages by participants and system messages.
